## Problem 1

### Part a

```{r}
n <- 5
sum(sample(1:n, size = n, replace = F) == 1:n)
```

### Part b

```{r}
sims <- replicate(1000,sum(sample(1:n, size = n, replace = F) == 1:n))
sum(sims > 0)/1000
```

### Part c

```{r}
prob_match <- function(n, B){
  sims <- replicate(B,sum(sample(1:n, size = n, replace = F) == 1:n))
  sum(sims > 0)/B
}
```

### Part d

```{r}
# approx P(winning) based on some number of cards and simulations
prob_match(n = 2, B = 10000)
prob_match(n = 3, B = 10000)
prob_match(n = 10, B = 10000)

# 1 - 1/e
1 - exp(-1)
```
